statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, document_name, issue_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_type, expiry_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, issue_date, expiry_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT document_name, issue_date, expiry_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type = 'Procedure' AND issue_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents, document_type FROM regulatory_documents GROUP BY document_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_documents DESC;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.'
SELECT license_id, company_name, license_type FROM licenses
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_type = 'ISO 9001'
SELECT company_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM licenses ORDER BY issue_date DESC
SELECT certification_id, company_name, issued_by FROM certifications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY issue_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, license_type FROM licenses WHERE license_type = 'Software' AND issue_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, issue_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_type = 'Security' ORDER BY issue_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND certification_type IN ('Network', 'Cloud') ORDER BY issue_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM licenses WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%' OR company_name LIKE '%LLC%' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, issue_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM licenses;
SELECT company_id, license_type, issue_date FROM licenses WHERE issue_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name FROM companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT certification_type, issued_by, expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE expiry_date IS NULL;
SELECT company_id, company_name, registration_date FROM companies WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM companies JOIN licenses ON companies.company_id = licenses.company_id WHERE license_type = 'Software' AND expiry_date IS NULL;

SELECT company_id, company_name, license_type, issue_date FROM companies JOIN licenses ON companies.company_id = licenses.company_id JOIN certifications ON companies.company_id = certifications.company_id WHERE certifications.issued_by = 'ABC Corporation' ORDER BY companies.company_name, licenses.issue_date;

SELECT certifications.certification_type, companies.company_name, certifications.issue_date, licenses.license_type, licenses.issue_date FROM certifications JOIN companies ON certifications.company_id = companies.company_id JOIN licenses ON companies.company_id = licenses.company_id WHERE licenses.expiry_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT companies.company_id, companies.company_name, COUNT(certifications.certification_id) AS certifications_count FROM companies LEFT JOIN certifications ON companies.company_id = certifications.company_id GROUP BY companies.company_id, companies.company_name HAVING certifications_count > 3 ORDER BY certifications_count DESC, companies.company_name;
SELECT * FROM licenses;
SELECT license_id, license_name FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM license_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT certification_name, issuer FROM certifications WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT certification_id, owner_name FROM certification_owners WHERE owner_email IS NULL;
SELECT license_name, expiration_date FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, issuer FROM certifications ORDER BY issuer ASC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM license_owners WHERE owner_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date FROM certifications WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT owner_name, license_name FROM license_owners INNER JOIN licenses ON license_owners.license_id = licenses.license_id;
SELECT * FROM licenses;
SELECT license_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM licenses WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT company_id, COUNT(*) AS license_count FROM licenses GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE issuing_agency = 'FDA' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;

SELECT companies.company_name, employees.employee_name, certifications.certification_name FROM companies INNER JOIN employees ON companies.company_id = employees.company_id INNER JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT license_name, issue_date FROM licenses WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY license_name ASC;
SELECT certifications.*, employees.employee_name FROM certifications INNER JOIN employees ON certifications.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT license_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM licenses WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_licenses FROM companies LEFT JOIN licenses ON companies.company_id = licenses.company_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_licenses DESC;
